name: Smash Hit Pyramids
description:
Smash Hit Pyramids is very addictive game to play. Smash Hit Pyramids is game which needs timing, concentration and focus. This is the game which you can play with first person perspective. In Smash Hit Pyramids you need to hit the glass pyramids and obstacles coming in your path with concentration, focus and timing to go as far as you can. Experience the best destruction physics with Smash Hit Pyramids. Stay focused and concentrate on the path, show your reflexes and timing to smash the pyramids and avoid the obstacles which appearing in your path by smashing them in time. Don’t let these obstacles to slow you down. Focus, concentration and timing is key to score maximum in Smash Hit Pyramids.

Game Features:
- Best object destruction physics
- Awesome game play
- Amusing background music
- 10 best gaming levels
- First Person perspective game

How to Play:
Tap on the screen to destroy the objects. Stay focused and concentrate on the path destroy every pyramid and obstacle coming in the path. Show your reflexes and hit the pyramids and obstacles in time to go as far as you can. Try to avoid obstacles by hitting then in time, if you hit the obstacle it will slow you down. So stay focus to go as far as you can.
